item.title: Where to Watch ‘Materialists’ Online
item.description: Writer-director Celine Song’s new film stars Dakota Johnson, Chris Evans, Pedro Pascal and others — here’s when the romantic comedy is expected to land on HBO Max.

item.title: Anne Hathaway’s Colleen Hoover Thriller ‘Verity’ Moves to Fall 2026 Release
item.description: Dakota Johnson and Josh Hartnett also star in Michael Showalter’s feature adaptation of Hoover’s bestseller.
